title: The Story of LawithanX
content: JEVON ZEEV - Full Stack Engineer, Polymath, and Cross-Disciplinary Creator
[ABOUT]
I am a cross-disciplinary creator, blending linguistics, coding, cybersecurity, finance, art, and philosophy.
[EDUCATION]
High School: Matriculated from Fourways High School, South Africa.
College: CTI Educational Group, Information Systems (Engineering), Higher Certificate level.
Independent Learning: Continuous upskilling via Udemy, open-source projects, and advanced online courses.
[WORK HISTORY]

EpicDev – Backend Developer (1 year): Worked as a backend developer while studying Information Systems at CTI Educational Group, gaining foundational professional experience alongside formal education.

DontWaste – Full Stack Developer (1.5 years): First full-time professional role. Built and maintained full-stack applications, contributing to real-world production systems and collaborative development workflows.
TEFL – English Teacher (International): Taught English abroad and traveled to Israel, developing strong communication, cultural adaptability, and instructional skills.
Tensology – Full Stack Engineer (6 months): Worked on full-stack development projects, contributing technical and creative input across design and implementation phases.

Tech-JCorp – Founder & Sole Proprietor (Present): Independent contractor providing multi-disciplinary services including full-stack development, cybersecurity, digital design, and Web2/Web3 solutions.
Also developing an open-source education portal focused on teaching linguistics, coding, and project-based learning.
[INTERESTS]
Cybersecurity & Networking, Science, Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Linguistics, Philosophy, Art.
[HOBBIES]
Skateboarding, Capoeira, Football (Soccer), Squash, Athletics, Boxing, Dancing.
[AWARDS]
Silver Award – Johan Carinus Art Centre (Sculpture, 16 September 2009).
Merit & Bronze Award – Johan Carinus Art Centre (Three-dimensional work, May 2010).
[CERTIFICATION]
TEFL – Teaching English as a Foreign Language.
[PROJECTS]
Tech-JCorp: Secure hybrid digital solutions combining three core skills: security, development, and design, delivered through a service portal with an open-source education focus.
URL: https://www.tech-jcorp.org
[CONTACT]
Email: lawithanx@tech-jcorp.org
